{{Wiktionarypar|Tintin|tintin}} '''Tintin''', '''Tin-Tin''' or '''Tin Tin''' may refer to: * ''[[The Adventures of Tintin]]'' (''Les Aventures de Tintin''), the series of classic comic books created by Belgian artist [[HergÃ©]] **[[Tintin (character)]], the protagonist of the series, a reporter and adventurer who travels around the world with his dog Snowy ** ''[[HergÃ©'s Adventures of Tintin]]'', the original animated TV series based on the comic books ** [[The Adventures of Tintin (TV series)|''The Adventures of Tintin'' (TV series)]], the popular animated TV series based on the comic books ** ''[[The Adventures of Tintin (film)|The Adventures of Tintin: Secret of the Unicorn]]'', the 2011 American performance-capture 3D film based on The Adventures of Tintin, created by Steven Spielberg and Peter Jackson, based on HergÃ©'s work. *** ''[[The Adventures of Tintin: The Game]]'' A video game based on the 2011 film. ** [[Tintin (magazine)|''Tintin'' (magazine)]], a Belgian comics magazine named after the character Tintin * [[TinTin++]], a MUD client * [[Tin-Tin Kyrano]], a character in the TV series ''[[Thunderbirds_(TV_series)|Thunderbirds]]'' * Tin-Tin, a character from the comic book ''[[The Crow]]'' by James O'Barr
==See also== * [[Tin Tin (band)]], British/Australian pop group * [[Stephen Duffy]], also known as "Tin Tin", a British musician * [[Rin Tin Tin]], a name given to several dogs with starring movie and television roles
